#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define max 100000
inline int getn(){
register int n=0, c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main()
{
int t,x,n,y,i,r,*a=new int[max],j;
t=getn();
while(t--)
{
  
  n=getn();
  x=0;a[0]=1;
  for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
  {
    r=0;
    for(j=0;j<=x;j++)
  {
    a[j]=(a[j]*i)+r;
    r=a[j]/10;
    a[j]=a[j]%10;
  }
  while(r)
  {
    a[++x]=r%10;
    r=r/10;
  }
  }
  for(j=x;j>=0;j--)
  cout<<a[j];
  cout<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
